summary: Yeahh another Lydia mod xDD This mod makes Lydia look prettier. She now has blond hair an blue eyes.
descriptionHtml:
Warning: I have deleted her armors and weapons. So she\'s now naked when you find/get her, but so it\'s easier to give her clothes whichhave no armorrating and so on xD Have fun with her

Requirements:
NO MORE BLOCKY FACE - <Website>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30</Website>

BETTER FEMALES VERSION 3 by BELLA - <Website>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812</Website>


Optional:
COOLSIMS HAIR PACK - <Website>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809</Website>

COVEREYES - EYES 1 - <Website>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869</Website>

Others:
author: JustxxxChaos
